mapper.select: select * FROM piaoke where cjsj BETWEEN DATE_SUB(SYSDATE(),INTERVAL 1 hour) and SYSDATE()
select zjhm FROM piaoke where cjsj BETWEEN DATE_SUB(SYSDATE(),INTERVAL 1 hour) and SYSDATE() GROUP BY zjhm HAVING count(1)>1
select a.zjhm FROM (select zjhm,type FROM piaoke where cjsj BETWEEN DATE_SUB(SYSDATE(),INTERVAL ${_parameter} month) AND SYSDATE() GROUP by zjhm,type)a GROUP BY a.zjhm having count(1)>1
select zjhm FROM piaoke where cjsj BETWEEN DATE_SUB(SYSDATE(),INTERVAL ${_parameter} month) AND SYSDATE() GROUP by zjhm
select * FROM piaoke where cjsj BETWEEN DATE_SUB(SYSDATE(),INTERVAL ${param1} month) and SYSDATE() and cjsj=(select max(cjsj) from piaoke where zjhm=#{param2}) and zjhm=#{param2}
